description: Default values for nm-vllm-grafana-dashboards. Declare variables to be passed into your templates.

fullnameOverride.description: Provide a name to substitute for the full names of resources.

label.description: Label used by Grafana's dashboards sidecar to identify config maps with dashboards that should be added to Grafana. Should match the value of the `sidecar.dashboards.labelValue` configuration in the Grafana chart.

labelValue.description: Label value used by Grafana's dashboards sidecar to identify config maps with dashboards that should be added to Grafana. Should match the value of the `sidecar.dashboards.labelValue` configuration in the Grafana chart.

nameOverride.description: Provide a name to substitute for the name of the chart.
